CustomField.description: Campo que almacena el importe de deuda del titular 2
CustomField.formula: IF( AV_CurrentBalanceAmount2__c>= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(AV_CurrentBalanceAmount2__c/ 1000000)) & ".", "") & IF( AV_CurrentBalanceAmount2__c>= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(AV_CurrentBalanceAmount2__c/ 1000)), 3) & ".", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(AV_CurrentBalanceAmount2__c)), 3) & " " & AV_CurrentBalanceCCY2__c
CustomField.label: Importe deuda titular 2
